sourcesContent:
import React ,{useState,useEffect}from 'react'
import { 
    Wrapper,
    Container,
    InputsContainer,
    SearchBox,
    SearchInput,
    FilterSelect,
    FilterOption,
    SearchIcon,
    CardsContainer,
    CountryCard,
    Image,
    CountryTitle,
    CountryInfo,
    Info } from '../HomePage/style'
import {AiOutlineSearch} from 'react-icons/ai'

function HomePage(props) {

    const [countries,setCountries] = useState([])

    useEffect(() => {

        const fetchCountry = async() =>{
            const response = await fetch('https://restcountries.com/v3.1/name/brazil')
            const data = await response.json()
            return setCountries(data)
        }
        fetchCountry()
    }, [])
    
    return (
       <Wrapper>
           <Container className ='container'>
                <InputsContainer>
                    <SearchBox>
                        <SearchIcon>
                            <AiOutlineSearch size = {22} color = {props.theme === 'dark' ? '#fff' : '#000'}/>
                        </SearchIcon>
                        <SearchInput placeholder = 'Search for a country ..'/>
                    </SearchBox>
                    <FilterSelect>
                        <FilterOption value="" hidden>Filter by Region</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='africa'>Africa</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='americas'>Americas</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='asia'>Asia</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='europa'>Europa</FilterOption>
                        <FilterOption value ='oceania'>Oceania</FilterOption>
                    </FilterSelect>
                </InputsContainer>
                <CardsContainer>
                   {country.name.common}
                </CardsContainer>
           </Container>
       </Wrapper>
    )
}

export default HomePage
